text: The Copenhagen Book provides a general guideline on implementing auth in web applications. It is free, open-source, and community-maintained. It may be opinionated or incomplete at times but we hope this fills a certain void in online resources. We recommend using this alongside the OWASP Cheat Sheet Series. If you have any suggestions or concerns, consider opening a new issue. Created by Pilcrow
html:
The Copenhagen Book provides a general guideline on implementing auth in web applications. It is free, open-source, and community-maintained. It may be opinionated or incomplete at times but we hope this fills a certain void in online resources. We recommend using this alongside the OWASP Cheat Sheet Series.

If you have any suggestions or concerns, consider opening a new issue.

Created by Pilcrow
